pages.text: The $(mob)Pig$() is an animal commonly found in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It flees when hit and can be bred using $(item)Carrots$(), $(item)Potatoes$() or $(item)Beetroots$().$(p)It is a good source of food when killed, but can also be given a $(item)Saddle$(). Unlike $(l:minecraft_horse)$(mob)Horses$(), a ridden $(mob)Pig$() cannot be controlled unless its rider is holding a $(item)Carrot on a Stick$().
